entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Americans, regardless of ancestry, are very angry at your do-nothing attitude at the beginning of the year, your failure to take meaningful steps to secure the nation, and your willingness to put lives at risk. Your casual attitude has led to COVID-19 in the White House.
